tool_description: Coordinates data deletion operations across multiple systems and ensures consistency of customer data removal throughout the organization.

target_systems.description: List of systems requiring coordinated deletion

operation_id.description: Primary deletion operation identifier from Selective Data Remover

coordination_mode.description: Coordination approach: sequential, parallel, or mixed

timeout_minutes.description: Maximum time to wait for system responses

rollback_on_failure.description: Whether to rollback changes if any system fails

error_messages: System coordination failed: One or more target systems failed to respond within timeout period.
Invalid coordination mode: Use one of [sequential, parallel, mixed].
Rollback failed: Unable to rollback changes after system failure.
Insufficient systems: At least two target systems must be specified.
Operation not found: The specified operation_id does not exist or is invalid.
System access denied: Unable to access one or more target systems for coordination.
usage: Provide customer_id, target_systems list, and operation_id from deletion operation. Choose coordination_mode based on system requirements and set appropriate timeout_minutes and rollback_on_failure options.

coordination_id.description: Unique identifier for this coordination operation

systems_failed.description: List of systems that failed processing

overall_status.description: Coordination result: success, partial_success, or failure
